page.title: 11WELSH ST DONATS_SHOPPING
page.content: Furniture is generally purchased at Cardiff and 1 person buys it at Cowbridge. For hairdressers the people of the village again have to travel mainly to Cardiff and Cowbridge with few people travelling to Pontyclun, Talbot Green and Bridgend. The most popular place to bank is Cowbridge with people banking at Pontyclun and Cardiff. Generally Cardiff and Cowbridge are the most popular places for shopping as there are no shops of any sort in the village. There are 27 houses in the village, 23 contributed to the survey.
